snippet.title: Phaser Fire short play (Apple II - Gebelli Software)
snippet.description:
Phaser Fire (https://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/phaser-fire) was an action game published by Gebelli Software in YEAR for the Apple ][. The game uses quarter track copy protection from track $D to $22 and you can hear the unique disk drive sound in the boot sequence. Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

PS: # of lives is stored at address $8009 and you can get infinite lives by changing $96A from $CE to $AD.

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com (hoeksmas)
Disk image - 4AM
